text: Mikryukovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Podlesnensky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 4 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 30 km from Sterlitamak, 9 km from Podlesnoye. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Mikryukovka
